name: Less than three (alpha demo)
description:
Less than three is a game about a girl and his boyfriend trying to find her dog.sound pretty simple! but everything just get weird when they notice theres is something else looking for their little pet.
you will fight against strange monsters and the cat army trying to get your dog back to the safety

TRY TO PLAY IT WITH SOMEONE OR USING A CONTROLLER
otherwise its imposibru 

Controls:
girl: Arrows(move) // - (jump) /// . (shoot)
Boy: WASD(move)// J (jump) ///K (shoot)
